definition: to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
to collapse/variant of 斃|毙[bi4]/variant of 獙[bi4]

sentences.english: I can pull an awful lot of cool stuff from it.
sentences.chinese: 我可以从上面下载很多酷毙了的东西。

sentences.english: Does the idea of making a home in a foreign destination sound crazy? Or awesome?
sentences.chinese: 在一个陌生的地方再次安家，是疯狂还是酷毙了？

sentences.english: But then it comes down to that notion of “I want” and “that's cool”.
sentences.chinese: 但之后就会变成“我想做”以及“酷毙了”。

sentences.english: Come on, all the cool kids drink.
But then it comes down to that notion of “I want” and “that’s cool”.
sentences.chinese: 但之后就会变成“我想做”以及“酷毙了”。

sentences.english: Its a beautiful place and the restaurants kick ass.
sentences.chinese: 那是个美丽的地方，而且那里的餐馆，酷毙了。

definition: (neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting/touching/moving/(of a person, esp. a woman) charming/cool
confident and at ease/free and easy
variant of 裝屄|装屄[zhuang1 bi1]
Chinese subculture of young urban migrants, usually of low education, with exaggerated hairstyles, heavy make-up, flamboyant costumes, piercings etc (loanword from "smart")
